item.title: What is killer voltage or current
item.description: Remember: voltage is the energy required to make current. If you say current kills but not voltage, its like saying bullet kills not the gun that triggers it. One interesting comment: High Voltage + Microamps Current = Tesla Coil and Van De Graaff Generator. High Current + Very Low Voltage = Welding Machine. High Voltage + High Current = Killer. Electric Power Lines and Lightning.

item.title: What Is Not Love
item.description: External-love is what I’m going to give, not what I’m going to get. (This line is bit vague) I good line that i need to keep in check is: “People make serious mistake in thinking, that you give to those who you love, and the answer is you love to those whom you give” His point is, if I give something to you, I have invested myself in you, since self-love is given everybody loves themselves, now that part of me has become in you, there is part of me in you that I love.
